name: Travian Bot
short_description:
Travian bot has the capability to automate tasks such as increasing your crop production, increasing clay,timber and iron resources in travian game.
It can automatically transport resources among villages and also launch attacks.

The software as of now is based on .Net framework, so only Windows users can run it as of now. If you are using Mac or Linux, you can try using VirtualBox from oracle to run this software virtually.
summary: This software automates simple tasks in travian game/
